kpi_info.title: AVERAGE NUMBER OF USED HSUPA SUBUNITS IN LCG
kpi_info.use:
The average amount of LCG subunits used by HSUPA over the whole measurement period duration, obtained by sampling with predefined sampling period, summing all the samples and dividing by the number of samples for the measurement period duration.
Note: Counter unit is the smallest subunit in the BTS. The counter does not contain PIC pool resources.
